name: Hacked (itch) (jovanhuang)
description:
This is a simple game that allows players to take on the role of a hacker and find vulnerable passwords that can be easily hacked by different hacking techniques.

The game ends after "Dictionary attack" level 2. However, if this game is selected for publishing/ prizes, we will be adding more levels for each hacking techniques  and even other hacking techniques like "Rainbow Hash" attack! Stay tuned! :)
